original: Bergelin, Fritz Elof August, apotekare, Västervik, f. 18/10/96 i Lund av bokbindarmäst. Isidor B. o. Anna Hane. G. 1. 19 m. Maria Engblom; 2. 35 m. farm. kand. Bertha Blomberg. Barn: Ulla f. 27, Britt-Louise 37. — Stud:ex. i Lund 13, farm. kand. 19, apotrex. 30. Elev v. apot. Lejonet i Malmö 16-18, anst. v. Hjorten i Lund 19-25, Älgen j Stblm 27-40, därunder förest, sju mån., bitr. lär. v. Sv. sjuksköt :fören. fortsättn :kurser 36-40, priv. å apot. i Hunn:ebo’strand 40, transp. t. Lejonet i Västervik 46.
translated: Bergelin, Fritz Elof August, pharmacist, from Västervik. Born on October 18, 1896 in Lund to bookbinder Isidor B. and Anna Hane. Married two times, first to Maria Engblom in 1919, and second to pharmacist Bertha Blomberg in 1935. Had two children: Ulla, born in 1927, and Britt-Louise, born in 1937. Completed his studies by graduating from Lund in 1913, receiving a pharmacy degree in 1919, and becoming a pharmacist in 1930. Worked as a trainee at Lejonet in Malmö from 1916-1918, was employed at Hjorten in Lund from 1919-1925, worked at Älgen in Stockholm from 1927-1940, where he was supervisor for seven months, and assistant teacher for the Swedish Nursing Association from 1936-1940. He later worked at a pharmacy in Hunnebostrand in 1940 and transferred to Lejonet in Västervik in 1946.
